text: H: Transmitted to Governor.
S: Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 821).
H: Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 888).
H: Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Kong voting no (1) and Representative(s) Cochran excused (1).
S: Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none.  0 Excused: none.
S: 48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 04-30-25
S: Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 257).
H: Forty-eight (48) hours notice Wednesday, 04-30-25.
H: Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 257) as amended in (CD 1).

H: The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 4 Ayes: Representative(s) Takayama, Garrett, Keohokapu-Lee Loy, Alcos; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.

S: The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) San Buenaventura, Kim, Kanuha, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
H: Received notice of change in Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 881).
S: Senate Conferees Changed: Senator Kanuha added as Co-Chair. Senator Hashimoto discharged as Co-Chair.
S: Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-25-25 5:20 PM; Conference Room 329.
H: Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Friday 04-25-25 3:15PM in conference room 329.
H: Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Thursday, 04-24-25 3:16PM in conference room 329.
H: Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 810).
S: Senate Conferees Appointed: San Buenaventura Chair; Kim, Hashimoto Co-Chairs; Fevella.
S: Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 732).
H: House Conferees Appointed: Takayama, Garrett, Keohokapu-Lee Loy Co-Chairs; Alcos.
S: Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 704).
H: House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
H: Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No.  638) in amended form (SD 2).
S: Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD  2). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none .  Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none).  Transmitted to House.
S: 48 Hrs. Notice 04-08-25.
S: Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1706) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).

S: The committee(s) on  WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in WAM were as follows: 13 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Moriwaki, Aquino, DeCoite, Elefante, Hashimoto, Inouye, Kanuha, Kidani, Kim, Lee, C., Wakai, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
S: The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 03-31-25 10:02AM; Conference Room 211 & Videoconference.
S: Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
S: Reported from HHS/HRE (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1276) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.

S: The committee(s) on  HRE recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in HRE were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Kim, Hashimoto, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Kidani; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Fukunaga.

S: The committee(s) on  HHS recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in HHS were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) San Buenaventura, Aquino, Hashimoto, Keohokalole, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
S: The committee(s) on HHS/HRE has scheduled a public hearing on 03-19-25 1:00PM; Conference Room 225 & Videoconference.
S: Referred to HHS/HRE, WAM.
S: Passed First Reading.
S: Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 105).
H: Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Kong voting no (1) and Representative(s) Cochran, Pierick, Templo, Ward excused (4).  Transmitted to Senate.
H: Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 905), recommending passage on Third Reading.

H: The committee on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamashita, Takenouchi, Grandinetti, Hussey, Keohokapu-Lee Loy, Kitagawa, Kusch, Lamosao, Miyake, Morikawa, Templo, Reyes Oda; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Holt, Lee, M., Alcos, Ward.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 02-21-25 2:00PM in House conference room 308 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
H: Report adopted; referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Cochran, Sayama, Ward excused (3).
H: Reported from HED (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 470) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to FIN.

H: The committee on HED recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Garrett, Amato, Kapela, Kila, La Chica, Olds, Sayama, Woodson, Souza; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Evslin, Muraoka.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by HED on Friday, 02-07-25 2:00PM in University of Hawai ªi at Manoa, Bachman Hall, Board of Regents Conference Room 106, 2444 Dole Street VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
H: Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on HED with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Cochran, Templo, Ward excused (3).
H: Reported from HLT (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 27) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to HED.

H: The committee on HLT recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Takayama, Keohokapu-Lee Loy, Amato, Chun, Marten, Olds, Takenouchi, Alcos, Garcia; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and  Excused: none.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by HLT on Wednesday, 01-29-25 10:00AM in House conference room 329 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
H: Referred to HLT, HED, FIN, referral sheet 2
H: Introduced and Pass First Reading.
H: Pending introduction.
